message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. This offer is in both our interests if we want to maximize our gains.
Your offer was a bit lopsided, Alice. Let's be fair to both of us this time.  This offer still gives you the lion's share.
Bob, it's clear we both lose out the longer this goes on. This offer is a good compromise. Take it before it's too late!
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  We're both losing money hand over fist.  Let's split it evenly and call it a day!
